data.message: Why is the coca cola lorry not coming to Leicester this year ?? After the fight with the mayor last year an all us Leicester lot signing a petition to get you to come to our town an then this year your not bothering very annoyed !!

replies.message: Hi Aimz, we try to cover as much of the country as we can but unfortunately, we can't visit every single town and city. To ensure that as many people as possible get the opportunity to experience the tour we update the route every year to add new locations. You can find more info about your closest stop here http://spr.ly/6180D6nRe
